# The Cattle King (film)

The Cattle King is a 1983 Australian film directed by Bill Bennett. It was a dramatised documentary about Sir Sidney Kidman.
The film was financed in part by Dick Smith and proceeds went to the Australian Stockman's Hall of Fame.
Cast
*Martin Vaughan as Older Sidney Kidman
*Scott Burgess as Young Sidney Kidman
*Jennifer Cluff as Young Isabel Kidman
*Hugh Keays-Byrne
References
External links
